com.orientechnologies.orient.core.storage.cache.pages

Class OPassthroughPageCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.storage.cache.pages.OPassthroughPageCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OPageCache

    public class OPassthroughPageCache
extends Object
implements OPageCache
    The no-cache passthrough implementation of a page cache, caches nothing.
    Author:
    Sergey Sitnikov

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OPassthroughPageCache(OReadCache readCache)
      Constructs a new passthrough page cache instance.

      Releases the pages associated with the given file.

    • Method Detail

      • loadPage

        public OCacheEntry loadPage(long fileId,
                            long pageIndex,
                            boolean checkPinnedPages,
                            OWriteCache writeCache,
                            int pageCount)
                     throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: OPageCache
        Loads the page.
        Specified by:
        loadPage in interface OPageCache
        Parameters:
        fileId - the page's file id to load from.
        pageIndex - the page's index in the file.
        checkPinnedPages - true to inspect the pinned pages in the underlying OReadCache, false to skip them.
        writeCache - the underlying write cache.
        pageCount - the number of pages to load.
        Returns:
        the loaded page or null if page is not found neither in this page cache nor underlying OReadCache.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there was an I/O error.
        See Also:
        OReadCache#load(long, long, boolean, OWriteCache, int)

      • releasePage

        public void releasePage(OCacheEntry cacheEntry,
                        OWriteCache writeCache)
        Description copied from interface: OPageCache
        Releases the page.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        cacheEntry - the page to release.
        writeCache - the underlying write cache instance.
        See Also:
        OReadCache.release(OCacheEntry, OWriteCache)

      • releaseFilePages

        public void releaseFilePages(long fileId,
                             OWriteCache writeCache)
        Description copied from interface: OPageCache
        Releases the pages associated with the given file.
        Specified by:
        releaseFilePages in interface OPageCache
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file id of the file.
        writeCache - the underlying write cache instance.

      • purgePage

        public OCacheEntry purgePage(long fileId,
                             long pageIndex,
                             OWriteCache writeCache)
        Description copied from interface: OPageCache
        Purges the page from this page cache, but not from the underlying read cache. On return, there are no references to the purged page in a context of this page cache, but the page is still present in the underlying read cache.
        Specified by:
        purgePage in interface OPageCache
        Parameters:
        fileId - the page's file id.
        pageIndex - the page's index in the file.
        writeCache - the underlying write cache instance.
        Returns:
        the purged page or null if the page is not cached by this page cache.

      • reset

        public void reset(OWriteCache writeCache)
        Description copied from interface: OPageCache
        Resets this page cache by releasing all cached pages.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface OPageCache
        Parameters:
        writeCache - the underlying write cache instance.
